Message:
“Our witch! Our beloved witch!”
As the men continued
their feverish chant,
I presented my head to them.

Then, the moment they placed
that cold crown on top of it,
my mind began to feel faint.
I see. That certainly is what it is...

If I lose focus for even a second,
it makes me feel like my
entire heart will be taken away.

I heard a voice scream
my name from behind me.

Being as weak as I am,
I know I’ll end up
turning to her,
begging her to save me.

That’s why, at least in the end,
I want to...

...You and the sun
go hand in hand.

Live on freely
under the bright,
open sky...
